title: Linear Functions Explorer
description: Interactive GeoGebra simulation for exploring the linear function y = ax + b. Includes dynamic sliders for parameters a and b, automatic visualization of slope, intercepts, and table of values.
author: Christos Chachoudis
learning_objectives: Understand the structure of the linear function y = ax + b.
Explore how the slope (a) affects the inclination of the line.
Investigate how the intercept (b) shifts the line vertically.
Connect algebraic, graphical, and tabular representations.
Identify x- and y-intercepts through exploration.
